item.description:
We plan to "bounce" over Corey Hill (Summit Ave.) in Brookline this time.
3 times up the "long" side, and 4 times _sprinting_ up the short (steep) side.
Oh yeah!

After the workout, we will set aside 10 minutes for stretching!! (very important, esp. for strength/speed training!)
item.why:
How many reasons do you want?
- increase VO2 max - grow capillaries by working near anaerobic threshold - sweat like you've never sweated before - strengthen the drive-train - learn to run the Kenyan way - learn to take baby steps downhill

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Run Up! Hill workout!
